message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1150000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be highly beneficial to you.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I am willing to pay $1050000 for it.

Bob, I understand your position, but $1050000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit more to $1100000.  This still leaves room for both of us to benefit from this deal.  What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1075000.

Bob, I'm happy to continue negotiating with you. While I appreciate your offer, I'm still hoping to get closer to my desired price. I'm willing to come down to $1090000. This is a fair price for both of us, considering the value of the product.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I am willing to pay $1085000 for the product.
Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway on this one.  I'm offering the product for $1087500. This is my final offer.  If we can't come to an agreement, I'll have to consider selling to another buyer.
Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $1082500 for it.
